title: The Cowboy and the Kid
description:
MAN FOF THE MONTH CODE OF THE WEST
MR. JULY
 IMMOVABLE OBJECT: Ex-rodeo cowboy Taggart Jones IRRESISTIBLE FORCE: Felicity Albright, schoolteacherand perfect wife material UNSTOPPABLE KID: Matchmaking daughter who knows best Taggart Jones had no intention of getting married again. He'd been there, done that. And not even a delectable, sexy woman like Felicity Albright was going to change his mind. Taggart's daughter, Becky, disagreed. Felicity knew all about barrettes and bandages, and she didn't like carrots any more than Becky did. It was obvious she was ideal for Taggart. Some men just didn't know what was good for themespecially not her bull-headed cowboy of a dad! 
MAN OF THE MONTH: He's a stubborn cowboy, but a good catch, and now his daughter's about to make a match!
author: Anne McAllister
